title: 2018 October 23 BBC One minute World News

json.text: this is BBC World News the headlines the US Treasury Secretary has held private
talks with the Saudi Crown Prince amid the international concern over Saudi
involvement in the murder of the journalist Jamal Khashoggi  Turkey's
president has promised to reveal details of the killing later today
Donald Trump has threatened to expand his country's nuclear arsenal to compel
Russia to abide by a 30-year old arms control treaty mr. Trump said the United
States would build up its nuclear weapons until Russia came to its senses
the longest sea bridge in the world has opened with a ceremony which the Chinese
President Xi Jinping has attended the 20 billion dollar project links Hong Kong
and the Macau Peninsula to mainland China archeologists have found what they
believed to be the world's oldest intact shipwreck the 23 metre vessel thought to
be ancient Greek was discovered more than 1.6 kilometers below the surface of
